about_the_game:
Step into the rugged boots of a lone gunslinger in Shooter a gripping 2D western platformer. Armed with a limited supply of bullets and bundles of dynamite, you're about to embark on a perilous journey through four challenging environments - the unforgiving desert, boundless prairie, towering mountains, and enigmatic forest.

The path ahead is fraught with danger, as you'll encounter a variety of adversaries, including ruthless bandits, deadly rattlesnakes, vengeful ghosts, grizzled miners, eerie skeletons, menacing cannons, and even unexpected encounters with swift samurai.

Your precise marksmanship and strategic dynamite usage will be the keys to conquering treacherous obstacles, shattering walls, and uncovering hidden secrets. But beware, at the end of each environment, a formidable boss stands ready to thwart your progress.

These epic showdowns will push your skills to the limit, as each boss wields unique abilities and tactics. Can you outsmart and outgun them to advance through the Wild West?

With time ticking away and your ammunition running low, do you possess the nerve, skill, and resourcefulness required to etch your name into the annals of western legend? Ride off into the frontier sunset, one shot at a time, in Shooter.

Your precise marksmanship and strategic dynamite usage will be the keys to conquering treacherous obstacles, shattering walls, and uncovering hidden secrets. But beware, at the end of each environment, a formidable boss stands ready to thwart your progress.

These epic showdowns will push your skills to the limit, as each boss wields unique abilities and tactics. Can you outsmart and outgun them to advance through the Wild West?

With time ticking away and your ammunition running low, do you possess the nerve, skill, and resourcefulness required to etch your name into the annals of western legend? Ride off into the frontier sunset, one shot at a time, in Shooter.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 230 MB available space

name: Shooter

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, or 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 230 MB available space
